snippet: The jeweler and sculptor has lived in the same downtown loft since she was a student.
abstract: Sculptor and jewelry designer Jill Plantner loves her fourth-floor loft apartment in NoHo, with its great natural light and space for her work.
lead_paragraph: The jeweler and sculptor has lived in the same downtown loft since she was a student.

headline.print_headline: An Artist in Her Element, a Garret
headline.seo: The NoHo Apartment of Artist and Jewelry Designer Jill Platner
headline.main: An Artist in Her Element, a Garret
